drug-interaction.name: Tetrabenazine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Eticlopride is combined with Tetrabenazine.

drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Eticlopride is combined with Deutetrabenazine.
